price: Those who were arrogant said, “As for us, we surely disbelieve in what you believe.”
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
